title: This is NOT heavy metal
body:
Someone spewed some stupid shit saying screamo bands like blessthefall and Pierce the Veil were heavy metal, so let me clear some shit up.
****
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p2So92kA0_A

^ This is screamo/metalcore. Its fine music, but it IS NOT HEAVY METAL.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9gOIed8Nfqc

^ This is Heavy Metal.
